Peaches and plant eggs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Peaches and plant eggs
By Dragon_king on Saturday, February 19, 2005 - 11:39 pm:

I was wondering,since i recently sharked my monster rancher game into having peaches and plant eggs in the shop, if i could fead my monster ten peaches in one weak and would it have the same effect as feading him 10 peaches over a period of years?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, February 20, 2005 - 12:31 am:

It depends on how old it is. The effect of a peach is to turn the clock back one year. If a monster is only 3 years old, and you feed 10 peaches, once you have fed the third peach, the rest are wasted.

By Dragon_king on Sunday, February 20, 2005 - 09:00 am:

ok ,so i just wasted like 30 peaches and 12 plant eggs on my 1 year 7 month tiger:( darn. ohwell i can get more. thanks alot Lisa for the info or i probably would be feading him 10 peaches and eggs a day for his entire life:).
